title: Jesus at the Feast of Tabernacles
summary: Summary for John 8. This chapter highlights the divine nature of Jesus, His miraculous signs, and His call to believe.

faq.question: What is a key message in John 8?
faq.answer: Jesus is the Son of God who brings eternal life to those who believe.

faq.question: What does John 8 teach about Jesus?
faq.answer: It emphasizes His divinity, compassion, and redemptive mission.
